Game_Structure

Class Base_Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game_Structure.Base_Component

  • public class Base_Component
extends java.lang.Object
    Base_Component Class is implemented as a update class (Project is trying to approach to Model-view-controller design pattern) This class mainly be called to update the Stats, energy, dialog, Inventory It also have the component for menu bar/ menu item and a proceed button as all this trigger an update
    Author:
    Edward Wong - University of Canterbury SENG_201 17/05/2020
